backend/main.mo: Defines extensive backend types for content, trends, ideas, stories, calendar posts, and monetization, prepared for migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration function initializing a new viewAdsUnlockMap for tracking per-user ad-view credits.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence for ad-based unlock credits, premium gating, and affiliate resources with associated frontend files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains high-level summaries of multiple frontend files including generators, onboarding, layout, and monetization components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables, global styles, and base component styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the full TanStack Router setup with protected routes, layout, theme provider, and global UI components.
frontend/src/components/ads/usePremiumGa: Provides a hook for gating premium actions using unlock credits, showing the ad dialog when credits are insufficient.
frontend/src/components/ads/WatchAdDialo: Implements an in-app ad-watching dialog that simulates ad playback and triggers credit refetching on completion.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGuard.t: Wrapper component that blocks access until user authentication and profile loading are complete, showing login prompts when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button that toggles login/logout using Internet Identity and clears cached queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/calendar/Calenda: Dialog form for creating and saving a scheduled calendar post with metadata like title, platform, and status.
frontend/src/components/generators/Capti: Generates caption variations from user input, with options for emojis and hashtags, and supports copying or saving results.
frontend/src/components/generators/HookG: Generates video hooks based on topic, tone, and selected categories, with copy and save functionality.
frontend/src/components/generators/ReelI: Generates reel ideas using niche, audience, style, and CTA inputs, with the ability to save generated ideas.
frontend/src/components/generators/Scrip: Generates full video scripts including hook, setup, payoff, and CTA, and allows saving the script as a video idea.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout component providing header navigation, user info, and footer around page content with route-aware active states.
frontend/src/components/monetization/Aff: Displays categorized affiliate resources with disclosure, learn-more links, and usage tips.
frontend/src/components/monetization/Bra: Interface for generating, viewing, copying, and saving brand pitches using user input and stored data.
frontend/src/components/monetization/Med: Tool for creating and saving media kits with user profile autofill, editable lists, and view mode.
frontend/src/components/monetization/Off: Form-driven creator offer builder supporting creation, viewing, and saving detailed monetization offers.
frontend/src/components/monetization/Rev: Tracks monthly revenue goals and entries, calculates progress, and allows saving goals and revenue items.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Onboa: Auto-redirects authenticated users with incomplete onboarding to the onboarding page using router state and onboarding storage.
Renders a grid of onboarding feature cards with icons, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Shows a modal for new authenticated users to enter profile details and saves the profile via a mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Returns the current identity, user profile, auth state, and whether profile setup is required.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, credits, video ideas, hooks, and other backend data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus light and dark mode CSS variables defining the app’s color system.
frontend/src/lib/affiliateResources.ts: Exports a list of affiliate resources with names, descriptions, URLs, and categories.
frontend/src/lib/brandPitchBuilder.ts: Generates personalized brand collaboration pitches including DM, email, and follow-up messages using user profile data.
frontend/src/lib/captionGenerator.ts: Creates multiple caption variants with emojis, styles, and optional hashtags, outputting StoryIdea objects.
frontend/src/lib/hookGenerator.ts: Builds video hooks from template categories, mapping each to hook types and generating VideoHook entries.
frontend/src/lib/onboardingStorage.ts: Provides localStorage helpers to get, set, and reset onboarding completion state.
frontend/src/lib/reelIdeasGenerator.ts: Produces structured reel ideas using niche-based templates with titles, beats, and visuals.
frontend/src/lib/scriptGenerator.ts: Generates a short-form video script including hook, setup, payoff, CTA, and editing suggestions.
frontend/src/lib/trendGenerator.ts: Creates trend candidates from keywords with titles, descriptions, scores, and categories.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/CalendarPage.tsx: Renders a content calendar with month and list views, loads user posts, and supports adding entries via a dialog.
frontend/src/pages/GeneratorsPage.tsx: Displays AI content generators with tabs and shows user credits with an option to earn more via an ad dialog.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page showcasing app features with hero, feature grid, and CTAs based on authentication.
frontend/src/pages/LibraryPage.tsx: Shows a tabbed library of saved ideas, hooks, captions, and trends fetched from user data.
frontend/src/pages/MonetizationPage.tsx: Provides monetization tools in tabbed sections including offers, pitches, media kits, revenue tracking, and affiliates.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Guides new users through onboarding features and redirects to generators after completion or skip.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Renders a settings page allowing users to view and update their profile fields, adjust theme, and reset onboarding, with form state synced to loaded profile data.
frontend/src/pages/TrendsPage.tsx: Implements a trends page where users manage a keyword watchlist, generate trend candidates, and save selected trends to their library.
frontend/src/utils/clipboard.ts: Provides a clipboard copy utility with secure and fallback methods for writing text to the clipboard.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Offers helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, versioning, feature descriptions, and development state for the AI content generator system.
